programme.desc: The Princess and the Pea. In a Korean version of "The Princess and the Pea," a queen (voice of Margaret Cho) becomes a royal pain to a princess. Other voices include Steve Park, Keone Young, Bianco Min, Karen Lew and Heidi Ahn

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales for Every Child
programme.desc: Pinocchio. An African-American accented "Pinocchio" features the voice of Will Smith as the wooden boy and Charles S. Dutton as his human papa, the toymaker Ol' George. Other voice talent: Chris Rock and Della Reese

programme.title: Jem and the Holograms
programme.desc: A small-town teen's singing video goes viral and catapults her and her sister's band into global super stardom, but their newfound fame threatens to break apart their familial bonds

programme.title: Mr. Magorium's Wonder Emporium
programme.desc: Molly Mahoney is the awkward and insecure manager of Mr. Magorium's Wonder Emporium, the strangest, most fantastic, most wonderful toy store in the world. But when Mr. Magorium, the 243 year-old eccentric who owns the store, bequeaths the store to her, a dark and ominous change begins to take over the once remarkable Emporium

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: Delightfully funny animated sequel sees the citified critter castaways getting airlifted off the island only to crash-land in the jungles of the dark continent, where they meet their species counterparts in the wild. Voices include Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, Jada Pinkett Smith and David Schwimmer. Directed by Eric Darnell and Tom McGrath. Willow Smith, daughter of Jada Pinkett Smith and Will Smith, provides the voice of baby Gloria

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: When junior high-school student Jason Shepherd realises that his class paper has been ripped off and turned into a hit motion picture called Big Fat Liar, he takes matters into his own hands. Along with his best friend, Kaylee, Jason travels to Los Angeles, where he intends to confront Hollywood big shot Marty Wolf, the sleazy producer responsible for ripping him off

programme.title: Fly Me to the Moon
programme.desc: Three tween-age flies (voices of Trevor Gagnon, Philip Daniel Bolden and David Gore) sneak aboard the moon-bound Apollo 11 in this state-of-the-art animated adventure. Based on actual NASA transcripts and blueprints, this educational, kid-friendly feature also features the voices of Christopher Lloyd, Nicolette Sheridan, Tim Curry and Kelly Ripa

programme.title: Jem and the Holograms
programme.desc: A small-town teen's singing video goes viral and catapults her and her sister's band into global super stardom, but their newfound fame threatens to break apart their familial bonds

programme.title: Racing Stripes
programme.desc: Kids of all ages will jockey for position in front of the TV for this heartwarming and funny family comedy about an abandoned zebra (voice of Frankie Muniz) that yearns to be a Thoroughbred after it is adopted by a Kentucky farm girl (Hayden Panettiere). Bruce Greenwood, Wendie Malick, M. Emmet Walsh. Other voices include Dustin Hoffman, Mandy Moore, Joe Pantoliano, Whoopi Goldberg, Michael Clarke Duncan, Snoop Dogg, Steve Harvey and David Spade

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb
programme.desc: Larry and his historical pals journey to London to save the magic that brings the museum to life

programme.title: Trouble With the Curve
programme.desc: An ailing baseball scout is given one last chance to prove his competence - and to reconnect with his daughter - on a scouting trip to North Carolina. Drama

programme.title: 27 Dresses
programme.desc: Anne Fletcher's rom-com stars Katherine Heigl as Jane, an amateur wedding planner for her friends, who hopes to be the blushing bride herself (eventually) to her advertising executive boss George. Her ambition is dashed when her fun-loving gorgeous sister Tess appears on the scene and sweeps him off his feet, leaving Jane to plan yet another wedding. But maybe there's hope for her in the shape of Kevin, a journalist who is intrigued by Jane's perpetual bridesmaid role and wants to write a story about her, if only they didn't mix like oil and water... Edited for language

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: A mischievous 8-year-old who's picked on by his older siblings and ignored by his parents would really rather be left alone—and that's exactly what happens when he gets accidentally left behind in a frenzied rush to the airport for a family vacation in Paris over the holiday season. After learning to fend for himself, the boy has to protect his house against two bumbling burglars who are planning to rob it

programme.title: A Little Curious
programme.desc: The Bob Show. "The Bob Show."

programme.desc: Everyday Magic. Telly and Abby use everyday objects to solve problems

programme.desc: Thumbelina. "Thumbelina" (voice of Rosie Perez) embarks on a handful of adventures in the South American rain forest. Other voice talent includes Harvey Fierstein (Mrs. Leaperman), Chita Rivera (Katy) and Antonio Sabato Jr. (Mario)

programme.title: The Electric Company
programme.desc: The Great Compromise. The Electric Company and the Pranksters work together toward a common goal: retaining their ability to use their special powers in the neighborhood

programme.title: Casper
programme.desc: The Friendly Ghost attempts to befriend the 12-year-old daughter of a paranormal expert, but his nasty ghost uncles wreak havoc

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: While trying to lift a curse that makes her unflaggingly obedient, a spunky young woman falls in love with a dashing prince

programme.title: The Secret Garden
programme.desc: Kate Maberly stars in this adaptation of the classic children's novel about a girl who discovers an abandoned garden on her uncle's large Victorian country estate. With the help of a local boy, the girl sets out to restore the garden and, once it is blooming again, she discovers it has special powers. After it has flowered, she brings her invalid cousin to the garden, and he is magically healed. Directed by Agnieszka Holland

programme.title: The Iron Giant
programme.desc: A giant robot falls to Earth and frightens a small town until it befriends nine year old Hogarth and ultimately finds its humanity by saving people from their own fears

programme.title: The Haunted Mansion
programme.desc: Creepy family comedy starring Eddie Murphy. A workaholic estate agent and his family become trapped in a Gothic mansion as they try to lift an ancient curse placed upon it, encountering a host of ghosts and ghouls along the way. Family entertainment featuring some elaborate special effects based on the popular Disneyland ride

programme.title: Casper
programme.desc: The Friendly Ghost attempts to befriend the 12-year-old daughter of a paranormal expert, but his nasty ghost uncles wreak havoc

programme.title: Rugrats in Paris: The Movie
programme.desc: The adorable Pied Pipers of diapers return in this cartoon charmer, which finds the toddlers frolicking in Paris. But the gang gets into a pickle when a wicked theme-park executive (voice of Susan Sarandon) schemes to marry Chuckie's widowed dad for her own selfish gain

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: Devious Lord Farquaad sends mighty ogre Shrek to rescue his bride for him. Horny dragons, wise-cracking donkeys and a grumpy ogre who just wants to be back in his swamp. Animation

programme.title: Project X
programme.desc: Matthew Broderick stars in Jonathan Kaplan's sci-fi comedy as Jimmy Garrett, a trainee air force pilot assigned to teach chimps to use flight simulators. He becomes particularly attached to VIrgil when he discovers the ape can use sign language learnt when he was part of a university programme. Then Garrett learns the real purpose of the simulator training: to fly Virgil through a fatal dose of radiation to simulate a nuclear attack on human pilots. He joins forces with VIrgil's trainer Teri McDonald, and the trio flee the establishment, but the military are hot on their heels, determined not to lose their star chimp. Edited for violence and language

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A commitment-phobic binge drinker living in New York City must reevaluate her feelings about intimate relationships when a sports doctor pursues a romance with her

programme.title: Bad Santa
programme.desc: Billy Bob Thornton is hilarious in this deliciously warped holiday comedy from director Terry Zwigoff ("Ghost World"). Thornton plays a vulgar, boozy con artist who robs the department stores where he works as St. Nick

programme.title: Strictly Business
programme.desc: A black yuppie rethinks life on the corporate fast-track after he falls in love with an ultra-hip club promoter. Knowing that she finds him a total square, he seeks the advice of a cool young mail clerk on how to approach her

programme.title: Life or Something like It
programme.desc: Romantic comedy about a TV reporter sets out to change her ways after a homeless psychic tells her that she has only a week to live

programme.title: The Salton Sea
programme.desc: Danny Parker is a crystal meth addict in LA, hanging out with his junkie friends and earning money on the side as an informant. In a world where parties go on for days and they frequently can't tell whether it's night or day, Danny questions whether these people are his real friends. But is Danny everything he seems? Starring Val Kilmer, Vincent D'Onofrio, Peter Sarsgaard, Adam Goldberg, Doug Hutchison, Anthony LaPaglia

programme.title: Frailty
programme.desc: An FBI agent investigates the case of a Texas serial killer, a religious zealot who believes he's on a mission from God and killing demons who are walking the earth

programme.title: Face Off
programme.desc: John Woo's action-packed thriller starring John Travolta and Nicholas Cage. When an FBI agent exchanges faces and identities with a terrorist, a deadly game of cat-and-mouse ensues

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: A Cuban refugee becomes a drug lord in Miami. Inspired by actual events

programme.title: Van Helsing
programme.desc: Outcast Van Helsing is charged with a mission to go to the shadowy world of Transylvania and vanquish the evil Count Dracula. He joins forces with a beautiful woman descended from a powerful royal family, but finds that his goal of annihilating the enemy brings him face to face with his own past

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: Run for the Money. A homecoming football game may be just the thing for Gamby and Russell to bring about Dr. Brown's downfall

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: John Frankenheimer's thriller stars Ben Affleck as Rudy Duncan, an ex- prisoner who assumes a dead cell-mate's identity to hijack his romance with Ashley, who had been sending him love letters. But her brother Gabriel knows Nick used to work in a casino and wants the security details so he can stage a spectacular robbery. Now Rudy has to stay one step ahead of the game to stay alive..

programme.title: The 33
programme.desc: A film based on the true story of the mission to rescue 33 miners who were trapped in a underground mine for 69 days

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: A Cuban refugee becomes a drug lord in Miami. Inspired by actual events

programme.title: South Central
programme.desc: An ex-con who has just been released from prison learns that his 10-year-old son belongs to a street gang in this compelling drama. The father looks to prevent his child from following the same path that led him to prison

programme.title: Paper Towns
programme.desc: In this moving coming-of-age tale, a nerdy teen falls for the enigmatic girl next door, who vanishes after the two have an adventure together one night. She leaves behind a trail of clues, which lead him and his pals to go on a road trip to find her

programme.title: Flight of the Conchords
programme.sub-title: Love Is the Weapon of Choice
programme.desc: Love Is the Weapon of Choice. Bret and Jemaine become rivals for the attentions of the same woman (Kristen Wiig), who happens to have an epileptic dog that has gone missing

programme.title: Ice Princess
programme.desc: A school nerd is brilliant with books but can'ft fit in, until she discovers an incredible talent for figure skating

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: In this nail-biting adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of climbers successfully scale Mount Everest, only to be faced with tragedy when a monster snowstorm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent

programme.title: Halloween H20: 20 Years Later
programme.desc: Laurie Strode is still tormented by her ordeal with killer Michael Myers 20 years on. When she learns that he has escaped once again, she becomes convinced he will track her down

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: In this thrilling and inspirational sci-fi drama, a lone astronaut is left behind on the hostile surface of Mars, and must use his ingenuity to create a habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, his crewmates and a team of scientists work to rescue him, in defiance of NASA protocol

programme.title: Magic Mike
programme.desc: Steven Soderbergh's Magic Mike stars Channing Tatum as the title character, an entrepreneur who works as a roofer and in several other occupations, but makes most of his money being the star attraction at Club Xquisite, a male strip joint in Tampa that fills every weekend night with drunken, horny women eager to slide dollar bills between hard-bodied dudes and the G-strings they wear. While on a roofing job, Mike meets Adam (Alex Pettyfer), a misfit college dropout who lost a football scholarship when he punched his coach, and he decides to teach the kid how to become an exotic dancer. Mike introduces Adam to Dallas (Matthew McConaughey), the owner of the club, and gets him onto the crew of regular performers. As Dallas plans a big move for the troupe, Mike tries to start his dream business, falls for Adam's sister, and sees Adam fall to the temptations of the stripper life

programme.title: High Fidelity
programme.desc: The thirty-something owner of a used-record store takes stock of his sorry excuse for a love life after his latest girlfriend leaves him

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: Exciting car chases and frenetic martial-arts action fortify this action-packed crime thriller from writer-producer Luc Besson. Jason Statham stars as Frank Martin, a deliveryman of illicit packages who gets mixed up in an Asian slave ring. Shu Qi, Matt Schulze, Ric Young, Francois Berleand

programme.title: 28 Weeks Later
programme.desc: Ripping sequel to the apocalyptic thriller "28 Days Later" (2002) finds Londoners returning after the killer virus has been eradicated—or has it? Directed by Juan Carlos Fresnadillo, who co-wrote the script with Jesús Olmo, Rowan Joffe and E.L. Lavigne

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: In this nail-biting adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of climbers successfully scale Mount Everest, only to be faced with tragedy when a monster snowstorm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent

programme.title: The Wrestler
programme.desc: Mickey Rourke is a fading pro-wrestler struggling to adjust to life outside the ring in this Oscar-winning 2008 movie. Marisa Tomei co-stars

programme.title: The Black Dahlia
programme.desc: Josh Hartnett and Aaron Eckhart play Hollywood cops who become involved with a mystery woman (Scarlett Johansson) while investigating the 1947 murder of an aspiring starlet. Brian De Palma directed this stylish version of James Ellroy's novel. Hilary Swank, Mia Kirshner, Mike Starr

programme.title: Appropriate Behavior
programme.desc: A bisexual woman (Desiree Akhavan, who also directed) from a staunchly traditional Persian family attempts to determine why her last relationship failed while staging silent acts of rebellion in response to her brother's recent engagement announcement

programme.title: Flash of Genius
programme.desc: Detroit college professor Robert Kearns presents Ford with an ingenious idea for the windscreen wiper. When the automotive giants steal his invention, Kearns embarks upon a long and arduous legal battle that takes a terrible toll on his personal life. Drama

programme.title: Meet the Donors: Does Money Talk?
programme.desc: Alexandra Pelosi looks at money in politics and interviews wealthy donors to Republican and Democratic parties to ask them about their contributions and philosophies. Also: a look at efforts to enact campaign-finance reform

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: All-star heist sequel. The remaining members of Danny Ocean's gang regroup to jeopardise the nefarious plans of a businessman who double-crossed one of Danny's old friends. The team plan to ruin the opening of his glitzy Las Vegas casino and hotel by rigging the games and ensuring that every punter goes home with a jackpot. Director: Steven Soderbergh (Conclusion of tonight's film)

programme.title: Spy
programme.desc: After years of doing work integral to the success of major missions, an intelligent but self-conscious deskbound CIA analyst (Melissa McCarthy) is finally given the chance to go undercover as a homely "cat lady" in order to save her missing partner (Jude Law) and thwart a global disaster at the hands of a dangerous arms dealer. Written and directed by Paul Feig

programme.title: Breach
programme.desc: When a royal Soul Reaper treasure is stolen, Toshiro Hitsugaya, boy-wonder captain of Squad 10, disappears too

programme.title: The Theory of Everything
programme.desc: This touching biopic of celebrated physicist Stephen Hawking explores his early years at Cambridge, where he fell in love with liberal-arts student and future wife Jane shortly before being diagnosed with ALS. As the years progress, Jane begins to feel more like a nurse than a spouse, and Hawking develops feelings for a woman who is hired to care for him

programme.title: Hollywoodland
programme.desc: Stylish 50s-set drama about a private eye investigating one of the entertainment industry's most enduring mysteries, the apparent suicide of Superman star George Reeves. However, his enquiries lead him deep into Hollywood's seedy underbelly, uncovering a love triangle involving a former showgirl and a powerful studio executive

programme.title: Lucy
programme.desc: Synthetic drugs give a woman superhuman powers, which she uses to strike back against her captors in this explosive thriller from the legendary Luc Besson. In time, her increased intelligence causes her to become disconnected from the rest of humanity

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Newlywed Ted wants to become a father, but must prove he's a person in a court of law first

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A commitment-phobic binge drinker living in New York City must reevaluate her feelings about intimate relationships when a sports doctor pursues a romance with her

programme.title: Sarah Silverman: We Are Miracles
programme.desc: Emmy-winning comedienne Sarah Silverman performs her adults-only stand-up in front of an intimate audience of just 39 fans in Los Angeles

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: John Form gives the perfect gift for his expectant wife, Mia with a beautiful and rare vintage doll in a pure white wedding dress. However their home is invaded by members of a satanic cult, who violently attack the couple on one horrific night

programme.title: Baby Boy
programme.desc: (2001) John Singleton's film is set in South Central Los Angeles, where it's another day in paradise for Jody (Tyrese Gibson), a hopeless, jobless youngster whose current partner, Yvette (Taraji P. Henson) has just had an abortion. Unable to care for the child he has by another woman, Jody is forced to live with his mother Juanita (A. J. Johnson), who has another preoccupation: her growing relationship with ex-gangster Melvin (VIng Rhames). To make some cash, Jody enlists the help of his friend Sweetpea (Omar Gooding) to boost some clothes and sell them on. It's a bad decision, compounded by his actions toward Yvette and the arrival of her sinister ex-boyfriend, Rodney (Snoop Dogg) on the scene... Premiere

programme.title: Strictly Business
programme.desc: In this lively comedy, an African American yuppie rethinks life on the corporate fast-track after he falls in love with an ultra hip club promoter. Knowing that she finds him a total square, he seeks the advice of a swinging young mail boy

programme.title: Godsend
programme.desc: A grieving couple is offered the chance to bring their late son back to life in this stylish thriller. Paul Duncan (Greg Kinnear) and his wife, Jessie (Rebecca Romijn-Stamos), are the proud parents of a bright, happy, and healthy eight-year-old son, Adam (Cameron Bright). Paul and Jessie are highly devoted to Adam, and are devastated when he's killed in a freak auto accident. The Duncans are still stricken with grief when they're approached by Dr. Richard Wells (Robert De Niro), who makes a startling proposal -- Wells operates an experimental fertility clinic, and he's developed a technique by which an embryo could be created from cloned cells taken from their late son, which would be implanted in Jessie's womb. Nine months later, Jessie would give birth to a child exactly like Adam in every way. While Paul and Jessie are initially shocked by this suggestion, in time they decide to give Adam the chance to grow to adulthood and they take up Wells on his offer. The cloned Adam is born healthy and content, and all seems to be well until the child begins to approach his eighth birthday, when events take a startling turn

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: Jerry Zucker's fantasy story stars Patrick Swayze as Sam Wheat and Demi Moore as Molly Jensen. He's killed in an apparent random mugging, leaving her heartbroken. But when it transpires he was murdered to stop him exposing a major fraud, Molly's in danger because the incriminating information is in her possession. Sam's ghost, still earthbound, finds out that the only way to warn her is through Oda Mae Brown, a fake medium who suddenly finds she's his channel to the living. A mix of comedy, thriller and romance (throwing a pot will never be the same again) coupled with outstanding special effects have turned this into an enduring, enjoyable classic

programme.title: The Bucket List
programme.desc: Academy Award winners Jack Nicholson and Morgan Freeman star in this touching, no-holds-barred adventure directed by Rob Reiner that shows it's never too late to live life to its fullest. One man was smart enough to go to college, but has worked his entire life as a mechanic the other owns the hospital in which they are both patients. But these two men with little time left and even less to lose discover that life can be deeply moving and definitely hilarious

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: Journalism; and the Opening Ceremony of the 2016 Olympics in Rio are discussed

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: World of Hurt. A search for Andre's weakness becomes a full-time job for Spencer and Joe; Vernon's anxiety gets the best of him; Jason's pursuit of a client is no easy task; Ricky tries to figure out where his dad is coming from

programme.title: The Night Of
programme.desc: The Season of the Witch. Detective Box pieces together Naz's whereabouts on the night of the murder. Meanwhile, Naz gets revenge for a recent attack; and Stone presses Trevor for details on the night of Andrea's murder

programme.title: Black Sea
programme.desc: A rogue captain accepts a potentially lucrative offer to seek out a sunken treasure in the Black Sea despite the sneaking suspicion that he may be double crossed

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: Thomas and the other Gladers journey across a brutal, obstacle-filled wasteland called the Scorch. Along the way, they search for information regarding the mysterious organisation known as WCKD

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A lonely, recently divorced teacher has an affair with a much-younger man. However, their relationship takes a terrifying turn as he grows obsessed with her

programme.title: Looking: The Movie
programme.desc: Patrick returns to San Francisco after spending nearly a year in Denver, but while he's in town for a wedding, he also must confront some unresolved relationships he left in his rearview mirror

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: Jerry Zucker's fantasy story stars Patrick Swayze as Sam Wheat and Demi Moore as Molly Jensen. He's killed in an apparent random mugging, leaving her heartbroken. But when it transpires he was murdered to stop him exposing a major fraud, Molly's in danger because the incriminating information is in her possession. Sam's ghost, still earthbound, finds out that the only way to warn her is through Oda Mae Brown, a fake medium who suddenly finds she's his channel to the living. A mix of comedy, thriller and romance (throwing a pot will never be the same again) coupled with outstanding special effects have turned this into an enduring, enjoyable classic

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: This Little Light. In the Season 1 finale, Kyle and Anderson search Rome for a surprise perpetrator, while Sidney clarifies his intentions

programme.title: Magnolia
programme.desc: P.T. Anderson's (Boogie Nights) wonderful ensemble drama with Tom Cruise (nominated for an Oscar), Philip Baker Hall, Philip Seymour Hoffman, William H. Macy, Julianne Moore, John C. Reilly all looking for meaning and happiness in the Valley

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: Chaos reigns when a virus starts turning humans into blood-crazed predators. An alternate ending follows the film. Strong language/strong bloody violence/flashing images

programme.title: Batman: Year One
programme.desc: In this thrilling origin story, Batman (voice of Ben McKenzie) begins his war on crime in Gotham City and decides to join forces with Lt. James Gordon (voice of Bryan Cranston), an honest cop dealing with a corrupt police force. Adapted from the comic-book series by Frank Miller and David Mazzucchelli

programme.title: This Boy's Life
programme.desc: Some of the biggest stars in the world - Robert De Niro, Leonardo DiCaprio, Ellen Barkin and rising actress Eliza Dushku - provide some very fine acting in this gripping drama exploring the violent relationship between a boy and his stepfather. In 1950s Seattle, single mother Caroline meets the seemingly courteous Dwight. She agrees to marry him, thinking he will be able to curb her son Toby's bad behaviour. Based on a true story

programme.title: A Little Chaos
programme.desc: In this ravishing romantic drama, gifted architect Sabine de Barra is hired to design a section of the elaborate landscaping at the Palace of Versailles for Louis XIV. The job brings with it gender and class barriers, and she also must contend with renowned landscaper André Le Notre, with whom she develops both a professional and romantic relationship

programme.title: Evan Almighty
programme.desc: God contacts Congressman Evan Baxter and tells him to build an ark in preparation for a great flood

programme.title: Tender Mercies
programme.desc: Tender Mercies is a compassionate love story tracing the relationship between a down and out singer and the young widow he meets in a small Texas town. Robert Duvall stars as MacSledge a man torn between the healing powers ofl ove and the conflicts of his past life as an alcoholic music star. Mac's love for his new wife Rosa Lee is tested by the temptations of renewed fame and the intervention of his bitter ex-wife, Dixie

programme.title: The Judge
programme.desc: A lawyer discovers his estranged father is the prime suspect in his mother's death when he returns to his hometown for her funeral

programme.title: Mulholland Dr.
programme.desc: David Lynch's Cannes-winning film stars Laura Elena Harring as the victim of a car crash who stumbles into Naomi Watts' apartment, her memory wiped. Watts, in Los Angeles to become an actress, befriends her but, as they try to discover Harring's true identity, neither of them are quite what they seem as Lynch subtly changes their lives and roles in this unique thriller

programme.title: Scream
programme.desc: Spoof of '80s slasher films about a killer who targets a teenager whose mother was brutally murdered the year before

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: This Little Light. In the Season 1 finale, Kyle and Anderson search Rome for a surprise perpetrator, while Sidney clarifies his intentions

programme.title: Victor Frankenstein
programme.desc: This re-imagining of the Frankenstein mythos focuses on Igor, the assistant of Victor Frankenstein. When the mad scientist builds an undead creature that soon becomes a grave danger, it's up to Igor to save Frankenstein from both the monster and himself

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: This Little Light. In the Season 1 finale, Kyle and Anderson search Rome for a surprise perpetrator, while Sidney clarifies his intentions

programme.title: Black Rain
programme.desc: Michael Douglas and Andy Garcia star in Ridley Scott's thriller as New York cops Nick Conklin and Charlie VIncent, charged with returning yakusa gangster Sato to Osaka to stand trial. But the pair are tricked into handing him over to his fellow gangsters and must, with the help of local cop Masahiro Matsumoto, track him down amid the violence and corruption of a city where they are strangers. In English, with some Japanese with English subtitles

programme.title: Under Siege
programme.desc: A fearsome group of terrorists seize control of an American battleship in this popular action film. What they do not know is that the ship's cook is a former Navy SEAL commando and an expert warrior, who is determined to defeat the terrorists and regain control of the ship

programme.title: The Long, Hot Summer
programme.desc: Orson Welles is the boss of a small Southern town who decides Paul Newman, who arrives with a reputation, will make a better heir than his weak son Anthony Franciosa. Into the mix is thrown Joanne Woodward as Welles' unmarried daughter and Lee Emick as Franciosa's passionate wife in Martin Ritt's steamy story (based on William Faulkner's stories) of smalltown life

programme.title: The Longest Ride
programme.desc: A star-crossed love affair begins between a retired bull rider who wants to get back in the saddle and an art student preparing to seek her fortune in New York City. As their relationship is put to the ultimate test, the wisdom of an ageing man who recalls his own lost love serves as a source of great inspiration

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Slinky space queen Serleena plots extra-terrestrial destruction and Agent J is going to need help. The only one who knows Serleena's secret is K, who's now a postal official with no knowledge of his former life. Can J persuade a reluctant K to put on the black suit for more alien-busting?

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: An Oscar-nominated Will Smith stars as Muhammad Ali in Michael Mann's heavyweight biopic of the boxing icon. Co-starring Jamie Foxx and Jon Voight

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: A con artist takes on an inexperienced apprentice, but struggles to keep his eyes on the prize when he develops romantic feelings for her

programme.title: Borat: Cultural Learnings of America for Make Benefit Glorious Nation of Kazakhstan
programme.desc: Spoof comedy about an idiot journalist who travels from his native Kazakhstan to America to find pin-up Pamela Anderson. On the way, he meets rodeo cowboys, feminists, snotty dining club members and New Yorkers

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: This Little Light. In the Season 1 finale, Kyle and Anderson search Rome for a surprise perpetrator, while Sidney clarifies his intentions

programme.title: What We Do in the Shadows
programme.desc: This mockumentary comedy follows four vampire roommates and their immortal struggle to be cool. When they're not looking for their next meal, the blood-sucking foursome are stirring up trouble with the local lycanthropes and bickering over housework

programme.title: Frank Miller's Sin City
programme.desc: In this collection of crime tales set in the underbelly of a miserable metropolis, a bruiser seeks the person who killed his one-night stand. Elsewhere, a cop is framed for a series of murders, and a group of prostitutes must dispose of a dead body

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: An Oscar-nominated Will Smith stars as Muhammad Ali in Michael Mann's heavyweight biopic of the boxing icon. Co-starring Jamie Foxx and Jon Voight

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: This Little Light. In the Season 1 finale, Kyle and Anderson search Rome for a surprise perpetrator, while Sidney clarifies his intentions

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: This Little Light. In the Season 1 finale, Kyle and Anderson search Rome for a surprise perpetrator, while Sidney clarifies his intentions

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: This Little Light. In the Season 1 finale, Kyle and Anderson search Rome for a surprise perpetrator, while Sidney clarifies his intentions

programme.title: Magnolia
programme.desc: Writer/director Paul Thomas Anderson followed his critical and commercial breakthrough Boogie Nights with this wildly ambitious story of lives intertwining on a single day in California's San Fernando Valley. Earl Partridge (Jason Robards), a successful producer of television game shows, left his wife when she contracted cancer to marry the younger and more beautiful Linda (Julianne Moore). Now, Earl has cancer himself, and Linda spends her day fetching medicines and trying to deal with the imminent death of her husband, whom she has only now come to love. Earl asks his nurse Phil (Philip Seymour Hoffman) to arrange a meeting with his estranged son, Frank Mackey (Tom Cruise), known for his self-help program "Seduce and Destroy," in which he preaches the importance of male sexual prowess; he cared for his mother after Earl left her, and he has no desire to see his father again. Earl's best-known show is hosted by Jimmy Gator (Philip Baker Hall), who also learns that he is dying. Jimmy's show pits bright adults against unusually smart kids; one of Jimmy's child contestants, Stanley (Jeremy Blackman), arrives late for a taping after being left stranded by his father Rick (Michael Bowen), who is supported by his more successful son. Meanwhile, Donnie Smith (William H. Macy), who was a champ on Jimmy's show as a child, is not having as much luck as an adult; he's just lost his job and needs to pay for some expensive dental work. Jimmy wants to reconcile with his estranged and emotionally fragile daughter Claudia (Melora Walters), who despises him and who will become involved with well-meaning police officer Jim Kurring (John C. Reilly), who has been desperately lonely since his divorce three years ago. Magnolia reunites much of the cast and crew of Boogie Nights and features eight original songs by singer/songwriter Aimee Mann and a musical score by Jon Brion(r)

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: "Trainspotting" director Danny Boyle mines new veins of horror in this apocalyptic thriller about a deadly viral outbreak and the resilient Londoners trying to survive in a world of infected, flesh-eating zombies. Cillian Murphy, Naomie Harris, Brendan Gleeson, Christopher Eccleston, Noah Huntley(r)

programme.title: This Boy's Life
programme.desc: This Boy's Life is a true-life coming-of-age story about '50s teenager Tobias Wolff (Leonardo DiCaprio) and his mother, Caroline (Ellen Barkin). After travelling around the country in an effort to avoid Caroline's abusive boyfriend, the mother and son settle in Washington state, where she marries a man named Dwight Hansen (Robert DeNiro), who appears to be a good husband and father. However, Dwight reveals himself as an abusive man shortly after the marriage; in particular, he verbally harasses and physically beats the young Tobias. By the end of the film, Tobias has to confront his stepfather. This Boy's Life is based on the autobiographical book of the same name by the real Tobias Wolff(r)

programme.title: A Little Chaos
programme.desc: Gifted architect Sabine de Barra is hired to design a section of the elaborate landscaping at the Palace of Versailles for Louis XIV. The job brings with it gender and class barriers, and she also must contend with renowned landscaper André Le Notre, with whom she develops both a professional and romantic relationship(r)

programme.desc: Follow-up to the hit comedy Bruce Almighty. God appears before a sceptical congressman to tell him that his destiny is to be the modern-day Noah and build an ark capable of withstanding a mighty flood. While the congressman initially struggles to come to terms with his task and begins to question his own sanity, he soon finds himself gathering animals, chopping wood and trying to convince his disbelieving family(r)

programme.title: The Judge
programme.desc: Robert Downey Jr's hot-shot lawyer must reconnect with his past when his estranged father is suspected of murder. Courtroom drama with Robert Duvall. (2014)(136 mins)(r)

programme.title: Mulholland Dr.
programme.desc: David Lynch is up to his surreal tricks in this dazzling puzzler, which takes place in a tony area of Los Angeles. A struggling actress (Naomi Watts) meets an amnesiac (Laura Elena Harring) and asks her to help her piece together her past. Their search leads to one twisted adventure after another. Justin Theroux, Ann Miller(r)

programme.title: John Carpenter's Ghosts of Mars
programme.desc: John Carpenter's chilling sci-fi horror. On Mars in the near future, Melanie Ballard, a tough cop returns to base as the lone survivor of a mission to capture the planet's most notorious criminal, Desolation Williams. Her debrief leads the film into flashback, following her and her team entering a remote colony, only to discover that the ghosts of the long-ago indigenous inhabitants have been released, transforming the colonists into blood-crazed monsters

programme.title: Ready to Rumble
programme.desc: Two enthusiastic young male wrestling fans watch their idol suffer what appears to be a humiliating defeat and decide to travel to Atlanta, the World Championship Wrestling headquarters, to cheer him up. They learn he is not at all the man they idolized; nonetheless, in a series of hilarious mishaps, they manage to revive his career

programme.title: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns, Part 2
programme.desc: Frank Miller's seminal graphic novel The Dark Knight Returns is adapted for the small screen with a sprawling Warner Premiere animated film series that finds an old and weary Bruce Wayne (voiced by Robocop himself, Peter Weller) donning the cape and cowl once again after a long retirement. Covering the final two issues of the series, Part 2 pits the outlawed crusader against his nemesis, The Joker (voiced by LOST's Michael Emerson), as well as a militarized Superman, who carries out justice in the name of the United States of America. Ariel Winter (Modern Family) plays a female version of Robin, with Dark Shadows' David Selby rounding out the voice cast. Jay Oliva (Green Lantern: Emerald Knights directs from a script by Bob Goodman

programme.title: Kill the Messenger
programme.desc: A reporter investigates a possible link between the CIA and the importing of cocaine into the U.S. in the 1980s

programme.title: Eagle Eye
programme.desc: Shia LaBeouf and Michelle Monaghan star as two strangers who become pawns in a diabolical plot and must work together to prove that they are not terrorists

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: A con artist takes on an inexperienced apprentice, but struggles to keep his eyes on the prize when he develops romantic feelings for her

programme.title: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
programme.desc: The final chapter in the epic tale of Bilbo Baggins sees the hobbit and company caught up in a war that threatens to destroy all of Middle Earth

programme.title: Batman Returns
programme.desc: When a corrupt businessman and the grotesque Penguin plot to take control of Gotham City, only Batman can stop them. Meanwhile, the mysterious Catwoman has her own agenda, which will give Batman something to think about

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: In war-torn Sierra Leone, a white African diamond smuggler offers to help a fisherman find his family in return for a precious stone. They are joined in their search by an American journalist who is covering the diamond conflict

programme.title: Run All Night
programme.desc: A former mob hit man is haunted by his life of crime. But when his estranged son is marked to be killed, he's forced to turn against his former employers in this white-knuckle thriller

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: An international assassin known only as Agent 47 (Timothy Olyphant) carries out high-profile hits for a mysterious organization known only as "The Agency" in this adaptation of the popular Eidos Interactive video-game series. Agent 47 is an elite, genetically engineered assassin who takes great pride in his work. His lethal grace, steady shot, and unparalleled precision have all served to make him one of the most sought-after assassins in the world. But when the killer without a conscience is faced with an unanticipated series of developments, his entire perception of reality begins to shift. On assignment to take out Russian head of state Belicoff (Ulrich Thomsen), Agent 47 is caught off guard by the appearance of presidential look-alikes. When the high-profile hit captures the attention of such powerful intelligence organizations as the CIA and Interpol, agent Mike Whittier (Dougray Scott) is dispatched to rein Agent 47 in. Meanwhile, a mysterious Russian prostitute named Nika (Olga Kurylenko) has walked into Agent 47's life, causing the methodical killer to become overwhelmed by emotions that were previously foreign to him

programme.title: Bodyguard: A New Beginning
programme.desc: The fists and bullets fly when respected Hong Kong bodyguard Leung (Vincent Sze) is assigned the task of traveling to the U.K. and protecting a mysterious young woman. Leung is the most-loyal bodyguard in the Hong Kong underworld. Recruited by his boss to protect a young woman in the U.K., Leung prepares to perform to the best of his abilities. But when the boss' son discovers the identity of the woman, a once-powerful empire quickly begins to crumble

programme.title: Dance of the Dead
programme.desc: High-school outcasts who weren't attending their prom try to save their classmates who are being terrorized by zombies at the big event

programme.title: Balls of Fury
programme.desc: Slapstick sports comedy in which a former table tennis champion is recruited by the FBI to infiltrate an undercover tournament organised by the fiendish criminal who was responsible for the death of his father

programme.title: Batman: Under the Red Hood
programme.desc: Diabolical vigilante Red Hood sets out to clean up the streets of Gotham City and destroy Batman. Meanwhile, as Red Hood brutally exterminates the scum of the city, the Joker reappears to taunt Batman in his darkest hour

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: Princess Diana transforms into Wonder Woman and battles Ares to save her people in this action-packed animated adventure featuring the voice of Keri Russell as the Amazonian superheroine. Other voices include Nathan Fillion, Alfred Molina, Rosario Dawson and Virginia Madsen

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: After a young boy witnesses his parents' murder on the streets of Gotham City, he grows up to become Batman, a mysterious figure in the eyes of Gotham's citizens. He emerges out of the shadows when the Joker a horribly disfigured individual appears. But the identity of the 'bat' is unknown

programme.title: The Kingdom
programme.desc: FBI agents clash with authorities in Saudi Arabia while probing a terrorist bombing

programme.title: Self/less
programme.desc: A dying New York real-estate tycoon undergoes a top-secret procedure to transfer his consciousness into the body of a healthy young man, but he discovers that his new life isn't what he expected after severing ties to his old one and learning about the mysterious origins of his new body

programme.title: Scream
programme.desc: Spoof of '80s slasher films about a killer who targets a teenager whose mother was brutally murdered the year before

programme.title: The Specialist
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone and Sharon Stone star in this hard-edged thriller about an ex-CIA explosives expert who helps a seductive beauty avenge the murder of her parents by a powerful Cuban-American crime boss

Leonidas is the king of ancient Sparta. The city is famous for its warrior philosophy, and Leonidas won't kneel to the demands of Persia's King Xerxes. Instead, Leonidas leads his 300-strong army against Xerxes's army of millions. Meanwhile, his wife campaigns in Sparta for the city to send reinforcements as she butts heads with the treacherous Theron

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: After a young boy witnesses his parents' murder on the streets of Gotham City, he grows up to become Batman, a mysterious figure in the eyes of Gotham's citizens. He emerges out of the shadows when the Joker a horribly disfigured individual appears. But the identity of the 'bat' is unknown

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: In this action-packed thriller, a mysterious, superhuman assassin teams with a young woman to take down a major corporation plotting to use his genetic makeup to create a race of unstoppable killers

programme.title: The Water Diviner
programme.desc: In this sweeping epic set in the Australian outback, a father gifted with the power to find water flowing underground fulfills a promise to his wife to locate their sons lost at the battle of Gallipoli

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: Michael Mann's stirring biopic about heavyweight champion Muhammad Ali which chronicles the boxer's life from 1964 to '74

programme.title: Bulletproof
programme.desc: Action comedy about an undercover policeman who befriends a petty criminal so that he can get evidence against a drugs baron. But with the target in sight, things start to go disastrously wrong

programme.title: An American Haunting
programme.desc: In 1818, the daughter of a Tennessee landowner is haunted by an evil spirit. Can it be stopped before the frights turn fatal?

programme.title: Beneath the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: When Taylor (Charlton Heston) disappears, Zira (Kim Hunter) and Brent (James Fanciscus) set out to find the missing explorer. They battle a disfigured group of revolutionaries who worship a nuclear bomb. Led by the Fat Man (Victor Buono), the group battles the apes and the astronauts for control of the territory. The leader of the apes is Dr.Zaius (Maurice Evans), who listens to Nova (Linda Harrison), the female scientist who expresses concern and compassion for the humans. Ursus (James Gregory) is the agitated ape who campaigns for a holy war against the Fat Man and his cronies in this science fiction drama

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: Perceptive comedy-drama following the ups and downs of the parent-child relationships within a large family. An over-protective dad - determined to do a better job than his own distant father - anxiously dotes on his troubled, eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his three-year-old daughter into an academic high-flyer but neglects his wife; and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers

programme.title: Innerspace
programme.desc: A test pilot is miniaturized and accidentally injected into a neurotic supermarket clerk. They work together with the help of the pilot's girlfriend to get him out

programme.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
programme.desc: Milos Forman's Oscar-winning adaptation of Ken Kesey's novel. Jack Nicholson plays McMurphy, a two-bit crook who, facing a jail sentence, feigns insanity to be sentenced to a cushy mental hospital. But his plan backfires when the hospital turns out to be anything but cushy, with its oppressive routines and a tyrannical head nurse who is out to quash any vestige of the patients' personal independence. Free-spirited McMurphy becomes a catalyst for the frustrations of his down-trodden fellow patients and a worthy adversary for the head nurse

programme.title: Horrible Bosses 2
programme.desc: The follow-up to the employee-revenge comedy finds Dale, Kurt and Nick endeavour to become their own bosses with a new entrepreneurial venture. When a slick investor steals their idea, the boys turn back to crime to seek some justice

programme.title: Burn After Reading
programme.desc: A disk containing the memoirs of a CIA agent ends up in the hands of two unscrupulous gym employees who attempt to sell it

programme.title: Mystic Pizza
programme.desc: Three teenagers learn a lot about life and love one summer in this romantic comedy-drama. Kat (Annabeth Gish), Daisy (Julia Roberts), and Jojo (Lili Taylor) are three working-class women just out of high school who have jobs at the same pizza parlor in the resort community of Mystic, Connecticut. Kat wants to study astronomy at Yale; when she starts baby-sitting for Tim (William R. Moses), a wealthy Yale graduate summering in Mystic, she finds herself falling in love with him, even though he's married and nearly twice her age. Daisy, who isn't sure what she wants from life, starts going with Charlie (Adam Storke), a recent law school dropout, though she starts to think that it may be more to rebel against her family than out of genuine affection. And Jojo is attracted to Bill (Vincent D'Onofrio), but she doesn't want to get married (she's already left him at the altar once); when Bill announces that he's no longer willing to have sex without marriage, she has to decide if his affections are worth a lifetime commitment. Conchata Ferrell appears in a supporting role as Leona, the proprietor of the pizza parlor, who zealously guards the secret formula of her sauce

programme.title: Music and Lyrics
programme.desc: Hugh Grant and Drew Barrymore make beautiful music together in this warm and winning romantic comedy. Grant is a 1980s rock star working the oldies circuit who teams with an unlikely collaborator (Barrymore) to write a tune for a reigning pop princess (Haley Bennett), who plans to perform the song with Grant at a mega-concert at Madison Square Garden. Written and directed by Marc Lawrence. Kristen Johnston, Brad Garrett, Campbell Scott

programme.title: What Happens in Vegas
programme.desc: Two strangers (Cameron Diaz and Ashton Kutcher) find themselves hitched after a wild night of Las Vegas shenanigans in this 20th Century Fox comedy. Jack Fuller (Kutcher) is a single Manhattanite who can never quite commit to a permanent, long-term relationship and repeatedly hears from his lovers that he "isn't serious boyfriend material." Employed by his father (Treat Williams) at a local furniture business, Jack spends his workdays goofing off by watching sporting events behind dad's back. Joy McNally (Diaz) is faring slightly better; a young, polished urbanite, she juggles a demanding job as a trader on the NYSE with a marital engagement to the impressive Mason (Jason Sudeikis), but has modified her entire life and all of her interests to please her intended. Coincident with Mr. Fuller's decision to fire his son, Mason severs his engagement to Joy; as a result, both Jack and Joy hit the skids at around the same time and decide to cut their losses by heading out to Vegas. The two accidentally bump into one another when a computer mix-up at the hotel puts them in adjoining rooms; though they begin their acquaintanceship by bickering endlessly, they end up spending a long, drunken night on the town together, and when the sun rises and Joy comes to, she discovers that she unwittingly married Jack in the middle of the night. Alas, just when the two are about to call it quits by filing for divorce after the shortest marriage in history, Jack tosses a coin into a Vegas slot machine and hits a three-million-dollar jackpot -- which naturally pits the newlyweds against one another in an attempt to claim the full share of the money. A conservative local judge, R.D. Whopper (Dennis Miller), then adds the final twist by refusing to grant a divorce until Joy and Jack have given married life a fair shake. In time, the marrieds may just discover that this union isn't as far off the mark as they initially thought. Dennis Farina, Queen Latifah, and Zach Galifianakis round out the supporting cast

programme.title: Just Married
programme.desc: A young newlywed couple honeymoon in Europe, where obstacles challenge their ability to sustain the marriage. Staring Ashton Kutcher and Brittany Murphy

programme.title: Eastern Promises
programme.desc: Nurse Naomi Watts gets mixed up with the Russian Mafia, but whose side is mob muscle Viggo Mortensen on? Brutal thriller from David Cronenberg. Strong language/violence/sex. (2007)(97 mins)

programme.title: Self/less
programme.desc: A dying New York real-estate tycoon undergoes a top-secret procedure to transfer his consciousness into the body of a healthy young man, but he discovers that his new life isn't what he expected after severing ties to his old one and learning about the mysterious origins of his new body

programme.title: Crimson Tide
programme.desc: Two Navy officers aboard a nuclear sub clash over their mission to avert a conflict with Russia

programme.title: Excalibur
programme.desc: Striking take on the Arthurian legend from director John Boorman, starring Helen Mirren and Nigel Terry

programme.title: Field of Dreams
programme.desc: "If you build it, he will come." That's the ethereal message that inspires Iowa farmer Ray Kinsella (Kevin Costner) to construct a baseball diamond in the middle of his cornfield. At first, "he" seems to be the ghost of disgraced ballplayer Shoeless Joe Jackson (Ray Liotta), who materializes on the ballfield and plays a few games with the awestruck Ray. But as the weeks go by, Ray receives several other messages from a disembodied voice, one of which is "Ease his pain." He realizes that his ballfield has been divinely ordained to give a second chance to people who have sacrificed certain valuable aspects of their lives. One of these folks is Salingeresque writer Terence Mann (James Earl Jones), whom Ray kidnaps and takes to a ball game and then to his farm. Another is Doc Graham (Burt Lancaster), a beloved general practitioner who gave up a burgeoning baseball career in favor of medicine. The final "second-chancer" turns out to be much closer to Ray. That "magical" field in Dyersville, Iowa still draws thousands of baseball-happy tourists each year

programme.title: Eagle Eye
programme.desc: Shia LaBeouf and Michelle Monaghan star in Disturbia director D.J. Caruso's race-against-time thriller concerning two strangers thrust together by a mysterious telephone call, and their frantic efforts to discover why they have inexplicably become the nation's most wanted fugitives. Jerry Shaw (LaBeouf) and Rachel Holloman (Monaghan) were complete strangers at the beginning of the day, but that changed the instant a strange woman called to threaten both their lives and the lives of their loved ones. Suddenly forced into a series of increasingly dangerous situations, Jerry and Rachel must now take orders from a woman who's using everyday technology to track and control their every move. As the situation intensifies and the hapless duo are deemed the country's most wanted fugitives, they must work together in order to discover who it was that turned their lives upside down, and what they can do to thwart the criminal mastermind's cunning yet diabolical plan. Billy Bob Thornton, Rosario Dawson, Michael Chiklis, and Anthony Mackie co-star

programme.title: Cold Mountain
programme.desc: A preacher's daughter struggles during the Civil War as she tries to keep the family farm afloat and awaits the return of her soldier beau

programme.title: Unfaithful
programme.desc: "Fatal Attraction" director Adrian Lyne tackles infidelity once again with this involving erotic thriller. Oscar nominee Diane Lane and Richard Gere are superb as a happily married couple whose union is threatened when the wife begins an affair with an attractive book dealer (Olivier Martinez). Erik Per Sullivan, Myra Lucretia Taylor

programme.title: Gone Girl
programme.desc: Man comes under suspicion when his wife disappears

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: A genetically engineered assassin known as Agent 47 finds himself on the run with a hooker after he is double-crossed on a mission in Russia. Timothy Olyphant and Dougray Scott star in this explosive adaptation of the popular video game

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: Retired hit-man John Wick (Keanu Reeves) hits the streets of NYC in search of the gangsters who robbed him of his reason for living in this Lionsgate thriller featuring Michael Nyqvist, Alfie Allen, Adrianne Palicki, Ian McShane, John Leguizamo, and Willem Dafoe

programme.title: Miller's Crossing
programme.desc: Mobster yarn about rival gangs vying for power during Prohibition

programme.title: Ladies in Love
programme.desc: The lives and loves of three Budapest belles. Janet Gaynor. Susie: Loretta Young. Yoli: Constance Bennett. Marie: Simone Simon. Rudi: Don Ameche. John: Paul Lukas. Karl: Tyrone Power. Kentner: J. Edward Bromberg. Sandor: Alan Mowbray. Horvath: Wilfrid Lawson. Directed by Edward H. Griffith

programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Poor girl makes sweet music with rich boy. Janet Gaynor, Charles Farrell. Eric: El Brendel. Bee: Marjorie White. Mrs. Cromwell: Mary Forbes. Eddie: Frank Richardson. Jane: Sharon Lynn. Joe: Joe E. Brown. Songs include the title tune and "If I Had a Talking Picture of You." David Butler directed

programme.title: Three Loves Has Nancy
programme.desc: About a small-town girl (Janet Gaynor) and the uproar she causes between an author (Robert Montgomery) and his publisher (Franchot Tone). Guy Kibbee, Reginald Owen, Claire Dodd, Cora Witherspoon, Emma Dunn, Charley Grapewin. Richard Thorpe directed

programme.title: The Citadel
programme.desc: Donat stars as the idealistic young doctor struggling to regain his true aims after being seduced by the bright lights and easy money of a lucrative Mayfair practice in this fine adaptation of A.J. Cronin's autobiographical novel

programme.title: Things to Come
programme.desc: William Cameron Menzies' version of the H.G. Wells futuristic novel about a post-World War collapse of civilization and its rebuilding through the year 2036

programme.title: Outcast of the Islands
programme.desc: Joseph Conrad's study of a derelict and his Far East encounters. Trevor Howard, Ralph Richardson, Robert Morley, Wendy Hiller. Babalatchi: George Coulouris. Carol Reed directed

programme.title: The Sound Barrier
programme.desc: Magnificent air sequences highlight this film about jet aircraft pioneers. Ralph Richardson, Ann Todd, Nigel Patrick. Philip: John Justin. Chris: Denholm Elliott. Jess: Dinah Sheridan. Will: Joseph Tomelty. David Lean directed

programme.title: The Four Feathers
programme.desc: Alexander Korda's spectacular production of AEW Mason's action-adventure novel was directed by his brother Zoltan. John Clements stars as Harry Faversham, who is unfairly accused of being a coward by three fellow-officers and his fiancée Ethne Burroughs, but proves himself a hero during the war in Sudan in the 1890s. With Ralph Richardson, C Aubrey Smith, Allan Jeayes, Donald Gray, Jack Allen and Henry Oscar

programme.title: Time Bandits
programme.desc: Surrealistic comedy-fantasy by director Terry Gilliam, with Craig Warnock as a young boy snatched from his suffocating suburban existence for a series of bizarre adventures in time and space by the renegade dwarfs led by David Rappaport

programme.title: The Wrong Box
programme.desc: In this film, the parents of several British boys place 1000 pounds in a pool, to be invested and expanded upon. The resultant fortune will go to the last surviving member of the tontine. Finally, only two of the tontine participants are left: aged brothers with murder on their minds

programme.title: The Heiress
programme.desc: In 19th century New York, a plain young woman falls in love with a handsome pauper. Her wealthy father, however, is sceptical of his motives and tries to put an end to their romance. Drama

programme.title: The Fallen Idol
programme.desc: Carol Reed directed Graham Greene's tale of a boy (Bobby Henrey) who lies to protect his idol, a butler (Ralph Richardson) whose shrewish wife has been killed. Michele Morgan, Sonia Dresdel. Crowe: Denis O'Dea. Fenton: Walter Fitzgerald. Voted England's Best Film of 1948 by the British Film Academy

programme.title: Anna Karenina
programme.desc: Headstrong New Zealand teen Alex Archer wants to qualify for the Rome Olympic swimming team. Unlike the other top athletes she must deal with a full school workload along with personal loss(n)

programme.title: Oscar Wilde
programme.desc: Frank account of the 19th-century playwright (Robert Morley) who was brought to trial for homosexual conduct. Phyllis Calvert. Douglas: John Neville. Ross: Dennis Price. Carson: Ralph Richardson. Clarke: Alexander Knox. Queensberry: Edward Chapman. Stagy. Gregory Ratoff directed(n)

programme.title: The Divorce of Lady X
programme.desc: Bright, light romantic comedy starring Laurence Olivier as a barrister who, through a misunderstanding, believes he has become involved in the divorce of Ralph Richardson and Binnie Barnes(n)

programme.title: East Side, West Side
programme.desc: The marital woes of sophisticated New York couple Mason and Stanwyck are stoked to fever pitch with the arrival of a beautiful waitress (Gardner) and an understanding cop (Heflin)(n)

programme.title: Meet Me in Las Vegas
programme.desc: A whole slew of guest stars makes Meet Me in Las Vegas a special treat for movie buffs. The central plot concerns wealthy rancher Chuck Rodwell (Dan Dailey), who takes a Vegas vacation with his mother (Agnes Moorehead). At the same time, ballerina Maria Corvier (Cyd Charisse) also arrives in Las Vegas, accompanied by chaperone Sari Hatvany (Lili Darvas). During one marathon gambling session, Chuck comes to the conclusion that Sari is a good-luck charm, and insists that she remain by his side throughout his visit. Naturally, their relationship deepens into love, but not before a few complications, misunderstandings, and song-and-dance duets. Among the celebrities making cameo appearances (à la Around the World in 80 Days) are Jerry Colonna, Paul Henreid, Lena Horne, Frankie Laine, Peter Lorre, and Sammy Davis Jr. (voice only). Featured as dancers in Cyd Charisse's troupe are stars-to-be Liliane Montevecchi and George Chakiris(n)

programme.title: Two Weeks in Another Town
programme.desc: An actor emerges from a mental hospital after a breakdown and is offered a role in a film by a director he's worked with in the past, but upon arriving in Rome where the movie is being shot, the troubled actor finds the production in a state of chaos(n)

programme.title: The Wild North
programme.desc: A driven, always-gets-his-man Mountie battles the harsh Canadian winter fraught with white-water rapids, avalanches and wolf packs in his efforts to bring in a trapper who killed a man in self-defense(n)

programme.title: Singin' in the Rain
programme.desc: In 1927, Don Lockwood and Lina Lamont are a famous on-screen romantic pair. Lina, however, mistakes the on-screen romance for real love. Don has worked hard to get where he is today, with his former partner Cosmo. When Don and Lina's latest film is transformed into a musical, Don has the perfect voice for the songs. But Lina - well, even with the best efforts of a diction coach, they still decide to dub over her voice. Kathy Selden is brought in, an aspiring actress, and while she is working on the movie Don falls in love with her(n)

programme.title: Brigadoon
programme.desc: Vincente Minnelli directs this charmingly whimsical musical about an American who stumbles across a ghostly Scottish village. Gene Kelly and Cyd Charisse star(n)

programme.title: Silk Stockings
programme.desc: Cyd Charisse and Fred Astaire dance and sing to a classic Cole Porter score in this musical remake of Greta Garbo's 'Ninotchka'(n)

programme.title: The Band Wagon
programme.desc: A has-been Hollywood dancer joins forces with a tempermental stage producer to put on a Broadway musical(n)

programme.title: It's Always Fair Weather
programme.desc: World War II service buddies reunite in a New York City bar 10 years after their discharge only to find they haven't that much in common anymore, until one of them gets in over his head with mobsters and the other two try to help him out of the jam. Directed by Stanley Donen and Gene Kelly, who stars as one of the three GIs(n)

programme.title: Tumbledown
programme.desc: In this witty, luminous and bittersweet comedy, the grieving widow of a singer-songwriter clashes with an acerbic journalist who arrives in her small Maine town announcing he's writing a biography about her late husband and his mysterious death. What begins as a clash of wills evolves into something more profound, as the journalist's presence helps her make peace with her husband's passing

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: Drama in which newcomer to California Ralph Macchio finds himself the victim of vicious attacks - but then wisens up thanks to Japanese karate master Pat Morita and becomes an expert in self-defence

programme.title: Déjà vu
programme.desc: Port Authority cop Doug Carlin travels back in time to save the key witness in the investigation into a ferry bombing. Thriller

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: Anarchic comedy that follows the efforts of a hapless gym proprietor and his misfit clients as they attempt to fend off the takeover bid of a rival bodybuilding empire. To generate much-needed cash for the virtually bankrupt facility, the motley crew enter themselves in a national dodgeball tournament and set themselves on course for a bruising showdown with a team made up of their foes. However, while the gym's unmotivated owner initially takes part only to appease his friends, he soon falls in love with the fast-paced sport - and the lawyer sent to oversee his finances!

programme.title: Dances With Wolves
programme.desc: A suicidal former Union soldier ends up joining a Sioux tribe. He then takes up arms to defend them when the Army attacks

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Don't Worry, Baby. A club expansion spreads Ghost thin, between Angela, the children, the business and Tommy. Meanwhile, Tommy faces a tough decision; Kanan returns to the life; and Angela has some doubts

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Age of Umbrage. When Cam's words during an interview are taken out of context, the result is a scandal that envelops the whole family

programme.desc: Ricki is an aging rock-n'roll-loving woman who abandoned her family in order to chase her tattered dream of becoming a famous rock star. Now, she is given one last chance to set things right when her ex-husband, Pete, asks her to visit her estranged daughter, Julie, in Chicago

programme.title: Grandma
programme.desc: In this biting comedy, an acerbic septuagenarian poet is drawn back into the lives of her workaholic daughter and teenage granddaughter when the latter asks for her help in dealing with an unplanned pregnancy

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: Based on the 1980s crime series of the same name, The Equalizer stars Denzel Washington as Robert McCall, a former Black Ops commando who faked his own death in hopes of living out a quiet life in Boston. However, when he comes out of his self-imposed retirement to save a young girl named Teri (Chloë Grace Moretz), he finds his thirst for justice reawakened after coming face-to-face with a syndicate of brutal Russian gangsters. Afterwards, McCall becomes the go-to man when the helpless require the kind of vengeance they would never find without his skills

programme.title: The Wedding Ringer
programme.desc: In this endearing, laugh-a-minute comedy, a socially awkward guy hires a professional best man to make his wedding a success. In time, their arrangement turns into a real friendship(n)

programme.title: Grandma
programme.desc: In this biting comedy, an acerbic septuagenarian poet is drawn back into the lives of her workaholic daughter and teenage granddaughter when the latter asks for her help in dealing with an unplanned pregnancy(n)

programme.title: Brüno
programme.desc: Gay style icon Brüno leaves Austria to cause chaos and controversy in the USA(n)

programme.title: Men of Honor
programme.desc: This military drama is based on the true story of Carl Brashear, who was the first African-American to serve as a diver in the United States Navy. Brashear (played by Cuba Gooding Jr.) was born to a poor farming family in the deep South, and joined the Navy in hopes of bettering himself. When Brashear applies for diving school, he first encounters Master Chief Billy Sunday (Robert De Niro), a gruff and tyrannical diving instructor who holds absolute sway over his charges. Sunday does little at first to encourage Brashear's ambitions, and the would-be diver discovers racism in the military is an ugly fact of life when his white comrades refuse to share barracks with him. But Brashear's courage and determination make an impression on Sunday, and the two men become allies as Brashear must fight prejudice, military bureaucracy, and even a crippling injury in order to realize his dreams. Originally announced under the title Navy Diver , Men of Honor also features Hal Holbrook, David Keith, Michael Rapaport, Charlize Theron, and Powers Boothe; Bill Cosby served as an executive producer for the project(n)

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Prequel in which prehistoric everyman Fred Flintstone woos wealthy Wilma Slaghoople as the fledgling couple travel to glitzy Rock Vegas with friends Barney Rubble and Betty O'Shale(n)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In this enchanting computer-animated fantasy, set in a world where the dinosaurs never went extinct, an amiable young Apatosaurus befriends a prehistoric human child as he embarks on a journey to reunite with his family(n)

programme.title: The Right Stuff
programme.desc: Nuanced, thoughtful drama following the pioneering efforts of the first American astronauts. Terrific performances all round, with surprising humour neatly undercutting any tub-thumping patriotism(n)

programme.desc: In this biting comedy, an acerbic septuagenarian poet is drawn back into the lives of her workaholic daughter and teenage granddaughter when the latter asks for her help in dealing with an unplanned pregnancy(n)

programme.desc: Retired tough guy Denzel Washington returns to his old ways to protect a girl from Russian gangsters. Slick thriller with Chloe Grace Moretz. (2014)(132 mins)(n)

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: Drama in which newcomer to California Ralph Macchio finds himself the victim of vicious attacks - but then wisens up thanks to Japanese karate master Pat Morita and becomes an expert in self-defence

programme.title: Déjà vu
programme.desc: Port Authority cop Doug Carlin travels back in time to save the key witness in the investigation into a ferry bombing. Thriller

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: Anarchic comedy that follows the efforts of a hapless gym proprietor and his misfit clients as they attempt to fend off the takeover bid of a rival bodybuilding empire. To generate much-needed cash for the virtually bankrupt facility, the motley crew enter themselves in a national dodgeball tournament and set themselves on course for a bruising showdown with a team made up of their foes. However, while the gym's unmotivated owner initially takes part only to appease his friends, he soon falls in love with the fast-paced sport - and the lawyer sent to oversee his finances!

programme.title: Dances With Wolves
programme.desc: A suicidal former Union soldier ends up joining a Sioux tribe. He then takes up arms to defend them when the Army attacks

programme.desc: In this witty, luminous and bittersweet comedy, the grieving widow of a singer-songwriter clashes with an acerbic journalist who arrives in her small Maine town announcing he's writing a biography about her late husband and his mysterious death. What begins as a clash of wills evolves into something more profound, as the journalist's presence helps her make peace with her husband's passing

programme.title: Brüno

programme.title: Men of Honor
programme.desc: This military drama is based on the true story of Carl Brashear, who was the first African-American to serve as a diver in the United States Navy. Brashear (played by Cuba Gooding Jr.) was born to a poor farming family in the deep South, and joined the Navy in hopes of bettering himself. When Brashear applies for diving school, he first encounters Master Chief Billy Sunday (Robert De Niro), a gruff and tyrannical diving instructor who holds absolute sway over his charges. Sunday does little at first to encourage Brashear's ambitions, and the would-be diver discovers racism in the military is an ugly fact of life when his white comrades refuse to share barracks with him. But Brashear's courage and determination make an impression on Sunday, and the two men become allies as Brashear must fight prejudice, military bureaucracy, and even a crippling injury in order to realize his dreams. Originally announced under the title Navy Diver , Men of Honor also features Hal Holbrook, David Keith, Michael Rapaport, Charlize Theron, and Powers Boothe; Bill Cosby served as an executive producer for the project

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Prequel in which prehistoric everyman Fred Flintstone woos wealthy Wilma Slaghoople as the fledgling couple travel to glitzy Rock Vegas with friends Barney Rubble and Betty O'Shale

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In this enchanting computer-animated fantasy, set in a world where the dinosaurs never went extinct, an amiable young Apatosaurus befriends a prehistoric human child as he embarks on a journey to reunite with his family

programme.title: The Right Stuff
programme.desc: Nuanced, thoughtful drama following the pioneering efforts of the first American astronauts. Terrific performances all round, with surprising humour neatly undercutting any tub-thumping patriotism

programme.title: Untraceable
programme.desc: Academy Award-nominee Diane Lane stars in this chilling thriller as an FBI agent trying to hunt down a serial killer who uses a website to document his murders. In a sadistic twist, his victims are killed at a faster rate when the site receives more hits, thus making everyone who views the site accomplices to the murder. As the phenomenon of the internet killings spirals out of control, the investigators' work on a timeline rushed by the dark nature of human curiosity and search for a killer who, having effectively covered his tracks, appears to be...untraceable!

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars in the incredible true story of a rebel German army officer who led a plot to assassinate Adolf Hitler and overthrow his ruthless Nazi regime during World War II

programme.title: Witness
programme.desc: Oscar-nominee Harrison Ford plays detective John Book, assigned to guarding Amish mother Rachel Lapp and her son Samuel, who witnessed a murder in Philadelphia station's restroom. But the killers are after them and the three must hide out in Lapp's community, where Book's aggressive, hard-bitten manner clashes with the gentler belief of the Amish in Peter Weir's tough, Oscar-winning romantic drama

programme.title: Regarding Henry
programme.desc: Harrison Ford stars in this moving drama as a successful but self-centred lawyer who, having placed his profession above all else, has become estranged from his family and is loathed by his work colleagues. However, one night his life is irrevocably altered by a stray bullet, temporarily retarding him physically and mentally. The shocking accident forces him to start over again, rebuilding his world and reassessing his life with the help of wife Annette Bening

programme.title: Predator
programme.desc: Hi-tech action fantasy about the unexpected enemy encountered by a unit of crack commandos on a rescue mission deep in the dense jungles of Central America. The routine operation becomes a desperate battle for survival against an alien predator that kills with a fury and efficiency unmatched by any creature on Earth

programme.title: Kingdom of Heaven
programme.desc: Ridley Scott directed this epic-scale historical drama inspired by the events of the Crusades of the 12th century. Balian (Orlando Bloom) is a humble French blacksmith who is searching for a reason to go on after the death of his wife and children. Balian is approached by Godfrey of Ibelin (Liam Neeson), a fabled knight who has briefly returned home after serving in the East. Godfrey informs Balian that he is his true father, and urges the blacksmith to join him as he and his forces journey to Jerusalem to help defend the holy city. Balian accepts, and he and Godfrey arrive during the lull between the Second and Third Crusades, in which the city is enjoying a fragile peace. Both Christian and Muslim forces are temporarily in retreat, thanks to the wisdom of the Christian monarch King Baldwin IV (Edward Norton), his second-in-command Tiberias (Jeremy Irons), and Muslim potentate Saladin (Ghassan Massoud). Violent agitators on both sides are foolishly eager to end the peace in a bid for greater power, and Saladin bows to pressures from Muslim factions; Godfrey is one of a handful of brave knights who has thrown his allegiance behind Baldwin IV and his community of diversity, and Balian joins him as they use their skills as warriors in a bid to build a lasting peace. Kingdom of Heaven also stars Eva Green as the princess Sibylla, David Thewlis as Hospitaler the priest, and Brendan Gleeson as Reynald

programme.title: The Night Before
programme.desc: Three childhood friends who get together every Christmas Eve plan one last epic night out to celebrate the end of an era
