Jonah Hill, Michael Cera and Christopher Mintz-Plasse star. Directed by Greg Mottola

programme.title: Kiss of Death
programme.desc: An ex-con takes on an undercover mission to bring down a notorious mobster. Samuel L. Jackson and Nicolas Cage star in Barbet Schroeder's remake of the classic 1947 thriller(n)

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: A billionaire art fancier orchestrates the theft of a priceless masterpiece(n)

programme.title: Just Before I Go
programme.desc: A suicidal ne'er-do-well puts together a bucket list for a last visit to his hometown: tell the truth to everyone close to him, confront the high school bully who made his life miserable, and try again for romance with an ex-girlfriend before calling it quits forever. The problem is, maybe life isn't done with him yet(n)

programme.title: Johnson Family Vacation
programme.desc: Cedric the Entertainer racks up the miles and piles on the smiles in this wild road-trip comedy. He plays the patriarch of a dysfunctional California family, traveling to a family reunion in Missouri. En route, they encounter obstacles---and laughs---at every turn(n)

programme.title: Forces of Nature
programme.desc: Academy Award winners Sandra Bullock and Ben Affleck team up in this hilarious romantic comedy. Ben Holmes, a pretty regular guy, is on his way to his wedding. A little accident hinders the takeoff, and soon Ben finds himself in a third person's rental car together with eccentric but attractive Sarah. Several catastrophic incidents later, the two are thought to be a married couple and run into Ben's best friend and his girlfriend, who happens to be the bride's best friend. Now, Ben and Sarah have to face the problem that they really might be made for each other, but they also might just be panicking about the upcoming events: His marriage and her first meeting with a special person(n)

programme.title: Kingdom of Heaven
programme.desc: A French blacksmith joins the Crusades and tries to achieve peace between Muslims and Christians in this spectacular historical epic(n)

programme.title: Aloha
programme.desc: A disgraced military defense contractor (Bradley Cooper) is rehired by an old boss to oversee the launch of a weapons satellite in Hawaii. Upon his arrival he reconnects with an old love (Rachel McAdams) but finds himself becoming increasingly attracted to an Air Force pilot (Emma Stone) assigned to watch over him(n)

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Emotions run wild in the mind of a young girl who is uprooted from her peaceful life and forced to move cities. Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness each have their own ideas about how she should handle her new surroundings(n)

programme.title: Aloha
programme.desc: A disgraced military defense contractor (Bradley Cooper) is rehired by an old boss to oversee the launch of a weapons satellite in Hawaii. Upon his arrival he reconnects with an old love (Rachel McAdams) but finds himself becoming increasingly attracted to an Air Force pilot (Emma Stone) assigned to watch over him(n)

programme.desc: A billionaire art fancier orchestrates the theft of a priceless masterpiece(n)

programme.title: Out of Sight
programme.desc: A successful bank robber manages to escape from jail. Outside he becomes involved with the Federal Marshal assigned the task of recapturing him..(n)

programme.title: Drugstore Cowboy
programme.desc: The operative word in Drugstore Cowboy is "drug". Matt Dillon plays the leader of a group of dopeheads who wander around the country robbing pharmacies to feed their habits. Dillon's chums include doltish James Le Gros and teen-age junkie Heather Graham; also along for the ride is Dillon's wife Kelly Lynch. Their nemesis is cop James Remar, whom Dillon takes perverse delight in humiliating. When one of the young addicts dies of an overdose, it promps Dillon to try to go straight, a task complicated by wife Lynch's determination to stay high and by the corrupting presence of an ex-priest, played by Naked Lunch author William Burroughs. Drugstore Cowboy was director Gus Van Sant's breakthrough picture

programme.title: 21 Grams
programme.desc: A tragic accident brings together the destinies of Paul, a gravely ill heart patient, Jack, an ex-con who has found God and Cristina, a loving wife and mother

programme.title: Separate Lies
programme.desc: A damaged relationship is stretched to its desperate limits in this drama. Anne (Emily Watson) and James (Tom Wilkinson) are a seemingly happy and prosperous British couple who divide their time between a flat in London and a house in the country. However, their marriage is not as contented as one might imagine, and for years James has turned a blind eye to just how deeply unhappy Anne has become with him. Their lives together reach a crossroads when Anne meets the handsome and charming Bill Bule (Rupert Everett); Anne becomes deeply infatuated with him, which only reinforces her dissatisfaction with James, but when the two become involved in an accident that kills another man, Bill drops out of the picture and James decides he must step forward to protect the woman he wed. Separate Lies was the directorial debut from screenwriter Julian Fellowes

programme.title: Monkey Kingdom
programme.desc: This nature documentary follows the struggles of a young monkey mother to care for and raise her new baby in the wilds of Southern Asia

programme.title: Testament of Youth
programme.desc: In this gripping historical drama, an adventurous young British woman wins a scholarship to Oxford, where she falls in love with a fellow student. Later, their relationship is tested when he joins the military following the onset of World War I

programme.title: Drugstore Cowboy
programme.desc: The operative word in Drugstore Cowboy is "drug". Matt Dillon plays the leader of a group of dopeheads who wander around the country robbing pharmacies to feed their habits. Dillon's chums include doltish James Le Gros and teen-age junkie Heather Graham; also along for the ride is Dillon's wife Kelly Lynch. Their nemesis is cop James Remar, whom Dillon takes perverse delight in humiliating. When one of the young addicts dies of an overdose, it promps Dillon to try to go straight, a task complicated by wife Lynch's determination to stay high and by the corrupting presence of an ex-priest, played by Naked Lunch author William Burroughs. Drugstore Cowboy was director Gus Van Sant's breakthrough picture

programme.title: A Simple Plan
programme.desc: Based on Scott B. Smith's bone-chilling 1993 novel, A Simple Plan is a bit of a departure for horror film director Sam Raimi. Instead of flying eyeballs and dancing corpses, A Simple Plan is a taut crime thriller in the vein of Joel Coen's Academy Award-winning Fargo. Set during the white winters of Minnesota, this story tells the eerie tale of Hank and Jacob Mitchell (played by Bill Paxton and Billy Bob Thornton) who, along with a buddy, find a downed single-engine plane buried in the snowy woods. Inside it is a decaying pilot and a bag carrying four million dollars in one-hundred-dollar bills. The men decide to hide the money until spring when the snow is melted and the plane is found. If no one notices the missing money at that time, they will split it and live a wealthy new life. A simple plan, right? Wrong. Much like Humphrey Bogart's The Treasure of the Sierra Madre, things can only get worse, as distrust and greed creep into the minds of the principals. They find it difficult to decide which one gets to hold the money -- and even more impossible to keep from dipping into the stash until spring. And so on. It also becomes increasingly tough to keep a secret of this magnitude. And if all this doesn't get moviegoers' brains working, it seems there are suspicious characters in town who just may be able to link them to the plane, forcing the more dangerous and bloody question of what to do with those people and how to cover their tracks

programme.title: The Thin Red Line
programme.desc: Terrence Malick's Oscar-nominated epic is set during the WWII American invasion of the island of Guadalcanal against fierce Japanese resistance. His first film after a 20-year hiatus, he uses a cast comprised of star names and then largely unknowns to evoke the reality of the carnage, aided by the cinematography of Oscar-winner John Toll. Following an army rifle company led by Lt Col Hall, the cast also includes Sean Penn, Adrien Brody, Jim Caviezel, John Cusack, George Clooney and Woody Harrelson

programme.title: A River Runs Through It
programme.desc: An evocative story of two brothers growing up in the breathtakingly beautiful landscape of Montana near the Big Blackfoot River, where they are taught the art of fly-fishing by their stern but loving father, a Presbyterian minister. As the boys grow older, they also grow apart, and although their shared love of fishing draws them together again, the shadows of tragedy are gathering in the background

programme.title: All the King's Men
programme.desc: Remake of the 1949 classic chronicling the rise and fall of ruthless Louisiana politician Willie Stark

programme.title: Catch a Fire
programme.desc: An involving fact-based political thriller set in 1980s South Africa, where a black man, after being unjustly arrested, turns anti-apartheid revolutionary

programme.title: 21 Grams
programme.desc: A tragic accident brings together the destinies of Paul, a gravely ill heart patient, Jack, an ex-con who has found God and Cristina, a loving wife and mother

programme.title: Taxi Driver
programme.desc: In Martin Scorsese's classic 1970s drama, insomniac ex-Marine Travis Bickle (Robert De Niro) works the nightshift, driving his cab throughout decaying mid-'70s New York City, wishing for a real rain to wash the scum off the neon-lit streets(n)

programme.title: Cut Bank
programme.desc: Suspenseful thriller about a man dissatisfied with small-town life who inadvertently captures a murder on tape. Expecting to collect the reward money and start a new life, he instead finds himself in a dangerous game of cat and mouse with a psychopath(n)

programme.title: Laurel Canyon
programme.desc: Laurel Canyon, a street that runs through the heart of the Hollywood Hills, has for decades been home to musicians, actors, artists and other bohemian types. Among its current residents is Jane, a veteran record producer trying to come up with a hit single for a British band whose lead singer Ian happens to be her much younger lover. Jane's son Sam and his fiancée Alex, are both recent graduates of Harvard medical school. Conservative and serious, the couple move to Los Angeles to complete their studies, planning to stay in Jane's home, which she had promised would be vacant. But when they arrive, Sam is distressed to discover Jane and the band still working in Jane's home recording studio. Jane's carefree lifestyle is anathema to Sam, who has devoted his life to being anyone but his mother's son. Sam and Alex grudgingly agree to stay at Jane's house until they can find an alternative place to live. Once in the house, however, Sam and Alex's tight control over their lives begins to unravel. Increasingly, Alex finds herself seduced by Jane and Ian, leaving Sam adrift, vulnerable to the approach of fellow medical resident Sara(n)

programme.title: A River Runs Through It
programme.desc: A memoir of two very different brothers---one reserved, the other a hell-raiser---angling for the attention of their preacher father, who uses fly-fishing as a metaphor to teach his Cain and Abel offspring about life in early 20th-century Montana(n)

programme.title: McFarland, USA
programme.desc: In this inspiring Disney sports drama based on actual events, Kevin Costner plays a high-school football coach who ends up leading a cross-country track team made up of lower-class Latino students to a state championship. Jim White (Costner) finds his days as a football coach numbered when an incident with a player leads to his dismissal. Desperate for work, he moves his wife (Maria Bello) and daughters (Morgan Saylor and Elsie Fisher) from Idaho to McFarland, CA, a rural town that's predominately Latino and the only place willing to give him a teaching job. The family feel like they don't fit into their new community, but White has an epiphany one day when he sees his students running from their early-morning farming jobs to school: Why not channel their talents into running cross-country track? Soon enough, White is connecting with his young charges, particularly a gifted athlete named Thomas (Carlos Pratts), and the squad set their sights on a state championship(n)

programme.title: Moon
programme.desc: Astronaut Sam Bell is completing a lonely three-year contract with Lunar Industries mining Earth's primary source of energy, Helium-3 on the Moon. As he prepares to finally return to Earth, Sam has to confront himself and the discovery that the life he has created may not be his own and it's more than his contract that is set to expire(n)

programme.title: Aloft
programme.desc: In this mystical and nonlinear drama, a mother reunites with her estranged son, whom she abandoned two decades earlier after a strange encounter with a faith healer(n)

programme.title: The Fourth Kind
programme.desc: In this disturbing chiller, an Alaskan psychotherapist uncovers irrefutable evidence that aliens are abducting humans during sessions with her patients(n)

programme.desc: A recent film-school grad gets a dream job as a personal assistant to a Hollywood mogul, who not only tyrannizes him, but also takes credit for his script(n)

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: When aliens mistake images of 1980s arcade games as a sign of aggression, they attack Earth with evil versions of Pac-Man, Donkey Kong and other video-game characters. In response, the US president asks his old gamer pals to battle the invaders

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: A man hoping to make his way back to the big time starts by heading back to middle school in this comedy. Roy McCormick (Martin Lawrence) is one of the most successful coaches in college basketball, but he's just as famous for his hair-trigger temper as he is for molding winning teams. When an outburst of anger during a game escalates into an embarrassing public indecent, McCormick loses his job and is banned from college sports. Looking for a way to rehabilitate his image, McCormick takes a job coaching the basketball team at the middle school he used to attend, only to discover his players are a handful of misfits and losers with no skill on the court. Can McCormick mold the kids into a winning team -- and make himself into a better man along the way? Rebound also stars Wendy R. Robinson, Breckin Meyer, Horatio Sanz, Megan Mullally, and Patrick Warburton

programme.title: I Heart Huckabees
programme.desc: Environmental activist Albert hires two 'existential detectives' to find out what's keeping him awake at night. They discover that Albert's mind is haunted by handsome rival, corporate PR exec Brad. But does Brad need more help than Albert?

programme.title: Cookie's Fortune
programme.desc: An outstanding ensemble cast including Glenn Close, Julianne Moore, Liv Tyler, Ned Beatty and Charles S. Dutton highlight this hilarious comedy about the suicide of a wealthy dowager (Patricia Neal) and its impact on a small Southern burg. Close plays the deceased's pretentious niece, who tries to cover up the suicide. Chris O'Donnell, Lyle Lovett, Donald Moffat. Robert Altman directed

programme.desc: John Cusack and Kate Beckinsale decide to let fate be their guide in this charming comedy about a man and woman who share an undeniable attraction when they meet, but concoct a series of experiments to determine if they are truly meant for each other. Jeremy Piven, Molly Shannon, John Corbett, Bridget Moynahan, Eugene Levy

programme.title: The Wash
programme.desc: Sean is financially strapped and on the verge of losing his home and his car until his roommate Dee Loc suggests he joins him as an employee at the local car wash. Tension mounts between the pals when the establishment's eccentric owner Mr. Washington promotes the more mature and responsible Sean over Dee Loc. However, when their boss is kidnapped, Sean and Dee Loc must work together to save their employer, their jobs, and their friendship

programme.title: The Wedding Singer
programme.desc: The film is a romantic comedy set in 1985 about a singer who, after being left at the altar, tries to piece his life back together with a waitress

programme.title: Cookie's Fortune
programme.desc: An outstanding ensemble cast including Glenn Close, Julianne Moore, Liv Tyler, Ned Beatty and Charles S. Dutton highlight this hilarious comedy about the suicide of a wealthy dowager (Patricia Neal) and its impact on a small Southern burg. Close plays the deceased's pretentious niece, who tries to cover up the suicide. Chris O'Donnell, Lyle Lovett, Donald Moffat. Robert Altman directed

programme.title: Serendipity
programme.desc: John Cusack and Kate Beckinsale decide to let fate be their guide in this charming comedy about a man and woman who share an undeniable attraction when they meet, but concoct a series of experiments to determine if they are truly meant for each other. Jeremy Piven, Molly Shannon, John Corbett, Bridget Moynahan, Eugene Levy

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: A man hoping to make his way back to the big time starts by heading back to middle school in this comedy. Roy McCormick (Martin Lawrence) is one of the most successful coaches in college basketball, but he's just as famous for his hair-trigger temper as he is for molding winning teams. When an outburst of anger during a game escalates into an embarrassing public indecent, McCormick loses his job and is banned from college sports. Looking for a way to rehabilitate his image, McCormick takes a job coaching the basketball team at the middle school he used to attend, only to discover his players are a handful of misfits and losers with no skill on the court. Can McCormick mold the kids into a winning team -- and make himself into a better man along the way? Rebound also stars Wendy R. Robinson, Breckin Meyer, Horatio Sanz, Megan Mullally, and Patrick Warburton

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: When aliens mistake images of 1980s arcade games as a sign of aggression, they attack Earth with evil versions of Pac-Man, Donkey Kong and other video-game characters. In response, the US president asks his old gamer pals to battle the invaders

programme.title: The Wedding Singer
programme.desc: The film is a romantic comedy set in 1985 about a singer who, after being left at the altar, tries to piece his life back together with a waitress

programme.title: Singles
programme.desc: During the Seattle grunge era, twentysomethings living in the same apartment complex come to terms with real life in the grown-up world

programme.title: Cheech & Chong's Nice Dreams
programme.desc: A tale of two drug dealers operating out of an ice-cream truck(n)

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Boston architect Newton Davis is an impulsive dreamer who builds a bucolic dream home for his girlfriend as a means of proposing to her -- only she turns him down. Three months later, the depressed Davis meets a waitress who calls herself Gwen, though pretending to be Hungarian proves to be only the first of her many deceptions(n)

programme.title: Strange Magic
programme.desc: A mysterious potion prompts a group of elves, goblins, imps, and fairies on an incredible adventure in this fantastical fantasy inspired by William Shakespeare's A Midsummer Night's Dream(n)

programme.title: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels
programme.desc: The south of France... Two rival con men -- one is suave and sophisticated, the other is a third-rate American hustler -- make a wager. The first one who extracts $50,000 from the next woman they meet wins...and the other leaves town(n)

programme.title: Kissing a Fool
programme.desc: David Schwimmer stars in this romantic comedy as an insecure sportscaster. He devises a scheme to test his fiancée's loyalty by persuading his best friend (Jason Lee) to try to seduce her. His plan backfires, however, when the two fall in love. Mili Avital, Bonnie Hunt, Vanessa Angel(n)

programme.title: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: Richard Pearce's comedy-drama stars Steve Martin as Jonas Nightengale, a con artist whose latest scheme has him posing as a traveling evangelist. When his caravan breaks down in a poor Southern town, he tries to make the best of the situation by exploiting the community for all its worth(n)

programme.title: Mixed Nuts
programme.desc: Humorous happenings behind the scenes at a crisis hot line provide the laughter in this comedy based on a French hit movie. The center, Lifesavers, located in Venice California, is operated by Philip. Upon the outside sign it announces with pride the number of people it has saved. But while the place is designed to help others it is plain to see that it is the staff counselors who really need the help. Included on staff are the over-emotional Catherine, a lonely woman who dreams of her shiny rescuing Knight while still living with her mother, and Blanch Munchnik a widow with a sharp tongue. When the holidays come, it is Lifesavers itself that needs the lifesaving as the landlord is threatening to boot them out if they don't pay a large amount of money. As they try to come up with the cash, the place is constantly bombarded by an assortment of mixed nuts including an Amazonian transvestite(n)

programme.title: Blankman
programme.desc: Are you ready for a new kind of superhero -- a thirty-something virgin in long underwear? Darryl Walker (Damon Wayans) is a bright but socially inept man with a gift for inventing things but little skill for functioning in the real world. His brother Kevin (David Alan Grier) works on a low-class tabloid news show featuring beautiful anchorwoman Kimberley Jonz (Robin Givens), whom he secretly loves. The Walkers live in Metro City, Illinois, a city that's been hit with a massive crime wave after the mayor is kidnapped by gangsters. After his grandmother is killed, Darryl builds a collection of crime-fighting robots from household junk, invents bullet-proof long underwear (made from his grandmother's old housecoat), and becomes Metro City's newest crime fighter, Blankman. Blankman's escapades put fear into the heart of mob boss Michael Minelli (Jon Polito), and when Kevin turns out to have an inside track on Blankman's activities, it brings him closer to Kimberley. But how long can a superhero with no superpowers last against the forces of organized crime? Damon Wayans wrote the original story for Blankman as well as co-writing the screenplay and playing the title role, which was based in part on his "Handi-Man" character from the TV comedy series In Living Color(n)

programme.title: Kissing a Fool
programme.desc: David Schwimmer stars in this romantic comedy as an insecure sportscaster. programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Age of Umbrage. When Cam's words during an interview are taken out of context, the result is a scandal that envelops the whole family

programme.title: Friday Foster
programme.desc: Pam Grier plays a fashion photographer who courts action and danger. Based on the syndicated comic strip. Colt: Yaphet Kotto. Ford: Godfrey Cambridge. Blake: Thalmus Rasulala. Madam Rena: Eartha Kitt. Enos: Jim Backus. Reverend: Scatman Crothers. Fancy: Ted Lange. Cleve: Tierre Turner. Directed by Arthur Marks

programme.title: Spartacus
programme.desc: The Dead and the Dying. Crassus learns that a fellow prominent Roman is attempting to steal the glory of defeating Spartacus he feels is rightfully his. Spartacus aims to secure a bargaining chip he can use against the Romans and celebrates the memory of a fallen brother

programme.title: Spartacus
programme.desc: Victory. The odds aren't in Spartacus's favour as the gripping saga of power and revenge presents its last-ever episode. Sex/violence/strong language

programme.title: On the Edge
programme.desc: A suicidal teenager finds help and love in group-therapy sessions with other patients his own age

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
programme.desc: The fate of the universe falls into the hands of cocky adventurer Chris Pratt and his ragtag team of unlikely heroes in Marvel's smash-hit superhero adventure

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: Based on the successful French film of the same name, Tim Story's all-action thriller stars Queen Latifah as Belle, who drives the fastest taxi in New York, thanks to a little tinkering with the engine. She teams up with inept cop Andy Washburn to catch a team of bank-robbing babes, led by Vanessa, whose wheels are just as hot. The plot is straightforward but the film scores with its high-octane energy and stunning stunts. Edited for language and violence

programme.title: American Violet
programme.desc: Nicole Beharie, Tim Blake Nelson, Will Patton, and Xzibit headline this fact-based drama about an innocent Texas mother caught up in a high-profile drug raid, and unjustly accused due to the uncorroborated testimony of a single informant. Dee Roberts (Beharie) is a young single mother of four living in a small Texas town. Arrested during a drug raid and accused of a crime she didn't commit, Dee goes against the wishes of her mother, Alma (Alfre Woodard), and rejects the plea-bargain that would free her from jail, but brand her as a felon for life. As word begins to spread that similar incidents are occurring in poor communities all across the country, Dee realizes that there are more mothers out there like her, and decides to take a stand against powerful district attorney Calvin Beckett (Michael O'Keefe). Now, despite being well aware of District Attorney Beckett's fierce reputation, Dee enlists the aid of ACLU attorney David Cohen (Nelson) and former narcotics officer Sam Conroy (Patton) in overcoming the seemingly insurmountable obstacles that, if not navigated with the greatest of caution, now threaten to destroy her life. With the custody of her children on the line, one brave mother wages a valiant battle to strike at the very heart of the corrupt Texas justice system

programme.title: What's the Worst That Could Happen?
programme.desc: A professional thief tries to recover a prized ring taken from him by a ruthless millionaire

The film also includes scenes with his family in his home town of Kansas City, Mo., where Griffin recalls his childhood with his mother and two uncles. George Gallo directed

programme.title: Chain Reaction
programme.desc: Eddie Kasalivich, an undergraduate at the University of Chicago, works as a technician for a scientific team that discovers an alternative, low-cost, pollution-free fuel source. When one of the chief scientists is murdered and the invention stolen, Eddie and physicist Lily Sinclair are framed for it and have to flee for their lives, with the FBI, CIA and other involved parties in close pursuit

programme.title: Eye for an Eye
programme.desc: Thriller about a woman who takes the law into her own hands to avenge the rape and murder of her daughter. Although the police arrest a suspect soon after the incident, he is released on a technicality. Frustrated by the impotence of the law, the girl's mother turns to a secret vigilante organisation and plots her revenge against the killer

programme.title: Blast!
programme.desc: When a threatening gang of terrorists hijack an oil rig off the coast of California, it's up to a former Navy Seal to ensure that their deadly plan is thwarted in this explosive action entry from veteran genre specialist Anthony Hickox. When Lamont Dixon (Eddie Griffin) took a job as a tugboat captain, he thought his days as a fighting military man were behind him, but when an offshore drilling protest unexpectedly turns into a terrorist hijacking, Dixon must leap into action to save the entire state of California. As the hijackers reveal part of their scheme and Dixon begins to suspect that there is more to the elaborate plan then they let on, his only hope is to team with sexy FBI agent Lisa Reed (Vivica A. Fox) to coordinate a counterstrike from the shore and save the lives of both the hostages and thousands of unsuspecting citizens

programme.title: American Milkshake
programme.desc: Filmmakers Mariko Munro and David Andalman team to write and direct this dark coming of age comedy set in the 1990s, and exploring the subjects of adolescent racial and sexual identity through the eyes of Al Jolson's great-great grandson Jolie (Tyler Ross), who takes the first step toward realizing his dream of being like the cool black teens in the Maple Avenue projects by joining his high-school basketball team

programme.title: Space Jam
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure combining live action and animation. The Looney Tunes characters capture sports star Michael Jordan to help them win a basketball tournament

programme.title: Big Game
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping an assassination attempt on Air Force One, the president ends up stranded in the wilderness of Finland in this pulse-pounding thriller. A 13-year-old hunter soon finds him, and they work together to evade a group of terrorists

programme.title: Maleficent
programme.desc: The untold story of Disney's most fearsome villainess comes to life in this dark fantasy. An unspeakable act of betrayal shapes a pure hearted young girl into the dreaded Mistress of All Evil. After witnessing her home invaded by humans, vengeful Maleficent places a curse on the king's newborn daughter, Aurora. Later, Maleficent discovers that the child may possess the power to not only pull her back from the dark side, but to restore the peace in their battle-scarred land as well

programme.title: Cinderella
programme.desc: An orphan named Ella is treated cruelly by her stepmother and stepsisters, who force her to do menial chores. However, her life changes forever when she meets a prince in this charming take on the classic fairy tale

programme.desc: Touching drama based on the true life story of a coach who dropped out of minor league baseball because of an injury, aged 23, and coached high school baseball during the twelve years since. His team's surprise success means he must honour a promise to try out as a pitcher for a professional team, with inspiring results

This tearful good-bye also reopens old wounds, as a karate expert and former friend of Miyagi's named Sato has never forgiven him for a decades-old slight

programme.desc: Following in the spike marks of "Field of Dreams" and "The Natural" comes a winning, fact-based saga about an Iowa small town faced with the closing of their high school, which has had an incredible string of championship baseball teams. Powers Boothe stars as the long-time manager "who [grows] ballplayers like corn" and who gets squeezed out of his position by the school board. Sean Astin costars as his inexperienced successor. Rachel Leigh Cook. Directed by David Mickey Evans ("The Sandlot")(n)

programme.desc: A seemingly perfect couple are actually dealing with a failing marriage, and seek advice from an elderly woman who urges them to find fulfillment through prayer(n)

programme.title: The Velveteen Rabbit
programme.desc: Michael Landon Jr. directed this touching feature adaptation of the beloved children's book. Sent by his father to spent Christmas with his grandmother, Toby discovers a "magic attic" in her home. There, he finds a stuffed velveteen rabbit that his mother had purchased for him before she died. As Toby begins to cry, his tears magically bring the rabbit to life. Later, when Toby falls ill, the courageous rabbit helps him to make a full recovery(n)

programme.title: Planes: Fire & Rescue
programme.desc: Plucky plane Dusty Crophopper joins the daring firefighting squad in this fun and thrilling animated adventure from Disney(n)

programme.title: The Day After Tomorrow
programme.desc: Directed by Roland Emmerich, this mega-budget, special-effects-laden epic revolves around the onset of an international series of crises brought on by the long-term results of the greenhouse effect. At the eye of the storm is paleoclimatologist (a professor dedicated to the study of weather patterns throughout the ages) Jack Hall (Dennis Quaid), who voluntarily takes on the preservation of the world in the dawn of the next ice age and all the disaster that comes along with it -- violent hurricanes, tornadoes, earthquakes, tidal waves, massive floods, etc. Hall must also contact his son, Sam (Jake Gyllenhaal), who was in the middle of an academic competition in New York City when the chaos begun. In addition to facing the largest-scale onslaught of natural catastrophes in the history of humankind, Jack, in his journey north, must contend with the masses fleeing south in an attempt to resettle in a warmer climate. The Day After Tomorrow also features Emmy Rossum, Sela Ward, and Joe Cobden(n)

programme.title: Big Hero 6
programme.desc: When a criminal plot threatens the hi-tech metropolis of San Fransokyo, brilliant young robotics whiz Hiro Hamada (voice of Ryan Potter) leaps into action with his tech-savvy friends, and his robot companion Baymax (voice of Scott Adsit) in Disney Animation's adaptation of the popular Marvel Comics series(n)

programme.desc: Lighthearted comedy drama about four ghosts who have the chance to tie up loose ends before moving on to the afterlife. In life, they were very different people who all happened to be passengers on a bus which crashed, killing everyone on board. At the time of the crash, a baby is born in a nearby car and the four spirits become linked to the child - little knowing that he can help them sort out the lives they left behind(n)

The story of football's Manning family, focusing not only on the careers of Ole Miss star Archie and his NFL sons Peyton and Eli, but on the sudden death of Archie's father and its impact on his approach to fatherhood. programme.desc: Four Falls of Buffalo. The Buffalo Bills incredible four year run of AFC titles and four consecutive Super Bowl losses in the early 1990s are recounted in this sports documentary directed by Ken Rodgers. From plucky underdogs to perennial losers, the Bills' unprecedented run of futility is analyzed by the players, coaches, and media members who were involved. Four Falls of Buffalo is a part of ESPN's critically acclaimed 30 For 30 documentary series

programme.title: E:60
programme.desc: Originally titled ESPN Reports, this was the cable service's effort to create a 60 Minutes-style weekly newsmagazine focusing on sports. The first episode set the tone with a piece on the "football fever" at Miami Northwestern High School, an interview with former major leaguer Cecil Fielder, a human-interest story concerning the tragically premature death of UNC Tar Heels "mascot" Jason Ray, and some musings from self-proclaimed sports psychic Dr. Bob. The individual segments were handled by such correspondents as Jeremy Schaap, Michael Smith, Rachel Nichols, Lisa Salters and Tom Ferry, while Bill Simmons, aka "The Sports Guy", appeared at the end of each episode with a few Andy Rooney-like random comments. Almost universally derided by the "legitimate" cable-news establishment, the series was generally praised by viewers as a noble effort to bring a straight-news slant to ESPN's familiar sports reportage. E:60 first aired on October 16, 2007

programme.desc: Brian and The Boz. Thaddeus D. Matula's documentary Brian and The Boz profiles Brian Bosworth, who became one of the greatest defensive players in the history of college football during his career at Oklahoma University. He was a brash personality, but his behavior and his ego led to trouble during his professional career where he flamed out after only a few seasons. This film features Bosworth looking back on his past, and was produced as part of ESPN's 30 for 30 series of non-fiction sports films(r)

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Time of the Doctor. Orbiting a quiet backwater planet, the massed forces of the universe's deadliest species gather, drawn to a mysterious message that echoes out to the stars. And amongst them, the Doctor. Rescuing Clara from a family Christmas dinner, the Time Lord and his best friend must learn what this enigmatic signal means for his own fate and that of the universe(n)

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: A Christmas Carol. Festive edition of the time-travelling drama. Amy and Rory are trapped on a crashing space liner, and the only way The Doctor can rescue them is to save the soul of a lonely old miser. But is Kazran Sardick, the richest man in Sardicktown, beyond redemption? And what is lurking in the fogs of Christmas Eve?(n)

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Snowmen. It is Christmas Eve, 1892, and the falling snow is the stuff of fairytales. When the fairytale becomes a nightmare and a chilling menace threatens Earth, an unorthodox young governess, Clara, calls on the Doctor for help. But the Doctor is in mourning, reclusive and determined not to engage in the problems of the universe. As old friends return, will the Doctor really abandon humankind, or will he fight to save the world and Christmas from the icy clutches of this mysterious menace?(n)

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: Living with Predators (Conservation). This final episode of the series visits the frontline of the conflict with the world's top predators, meeting the scientists fighting to save them.
